children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2009 ዓ.ም.
children.title: የውሃ ሀብታችን
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2009 ዓ.ም.
children.title: የጐረቤት ልጆች ጨዋታ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2009 ዓ.ም.
children.title: መልካምሰው
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2008 ዓ.ም.
children.title: አባራሪና ተባራሪ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2008 ዓ.ም.
children.title: ስህተቴ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2008 ዓ.ም.
children.title: የኤሊ ብልሃት
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: ይህ አጋዥ የንባብ መጽሐፍ ከዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.አይ.ዲ. (USAID) በተገኘ የገንዘብ ድጋፍ በሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረን (Save the Children)፣ በትምህርት ሚኒስቴር እና በአማራ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግሥት ትምህርት ቢሮ የጋራ ትብብር ተዘጋጅቶ ታተመ። 2008 ዓ.ም.
children.title: ታውቁኛላችሁ?
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: সমীর ক্ষুধার্ত কিন্তু কী খাবার আছে? তার পরিবার যে খাবারের কথা বলবে তা কি সে অনুমান করতে পারে?
children.title: সমীর ক্ষুধার্ত
children.author: Rochak Dahal

children.description: পোশাক উৎসবের বর্ণ, শব্দ, গন্ধ ও অনুভূতি উপভোগ করো।
children.title: উৎসব
children.author: Venisha Udas

children.description: ট্যাপ সাহেব কঠোর পরিশ্রম করেন। তিনি পানি সরবরাহ করেন। প্রতিদিন কেন ট্যাপ সাহেবের পানির দরকার হয় লোকজনের?
children.title: ট্যাপ সাহেব
children.author: Prabha Bhattarai

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুর একট চিহ্ন দেখতে পায়। অর্থহীন চিহ্ন; এটি অনবরত হরফ পরিবর্তন করে! তখন, অপ্রত্যাশিত কিছু ঘটে।
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং পোকা
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: সাতদিনের ছুটির সকল মজাদার কাজকর্ম পড়ো এবং উপভোগ করো।
children.title: সাতদিনের ছুটি
children.author: Harihar Timilsina

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুরের জন্য এখন আঁকার সময়। তারা কী আঁকবে? তুমি কী আঁকা শিখবে?
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর: আঁকো এবং রঙ করো
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: কুকুর বেশ শীত লাগে! ভাগ্যিস, বিড়ালের অনেক অতিরিক্ত জামাকাপড় আছে যা কুকুর পড়ে দেখতে পারে।
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর: কুকুরের শীত লাগে
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: শানু এবং তার বন্ধুরা বেলুন ফুলালো এবং তা ফেটে গেলো। তোমার কি মনে হয় কি ঘটলো যখন শেষ বেলুনটি ফেটে গেলো?
children.title: বেলু্ন ফোলানো
children.author: Sudha Ojha

children.description: বিট্টু তার রঙিন বল হারিয়ে ফেলেছে। পশুপাখিরা কি বিট্টুকে সেই বল খুঁজে পেতে সাহায্য করতে পারে?
children.title: বিট্টুর রঙিন বল
children.author: Venisha Udas

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুর একটি রঙিন প্রজাপতি ধরতে চায়। কিন্তু প্রজাপতিটি দ্রুত উড়ে যায়।
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং প্রজাপতি
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুর বৃষ্টিতে আটকে পড়েছে। তাদের পিঠের ব্যাগগুলো কি ভিজে যাবে নাকি ঠিক সময়মতো কোনো বন্ধু ছাতা নিয়ে হাজির হবে?
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং বৃষ্টি
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: কুকুরের দরজায় হলুদ প্রাণিটি কে? এটা যে বিড়াল — কিন্তু বিড়ালটি হলুদ কেন?
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর: হলুদ বিড়াল
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুর বল নিয়ে খেলে। তখনই একটা ভুল হয়ে যায়। ভাগ্যিস, হাতি নিকটেই ছিলো এবং সে সাহায্য করতে এগিয়ে আসে!
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং বল
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: বাজারে কতোকিছু দেখার ও করার আছে। তুমি বাজারে কী কী দেখতে পাও?
children.title: আমার বাজারে যাওয়া
children.author: Deepa Dixit

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুর একটি রহস্যময় ডিম দেখতে পায়। এটি কার হতে পারে? খুঁজে দেখতে বিড়াল ও কুকুর অভিযানে বের হয়।
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং ডিম
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: জীবন ঘুড়ি ওড়াতে চায়, কিন্তু সে জানে না কিভাবে তা করতে হয়। জেনে নাও জীবন ও তার বোন রমিলার ঘুড়ি ওড়ানোর জন্য কীকী জানা দরকার।
children.title: চলো ঘুড়ি উড়াই!
children.author: Rochak Dahal

children.description: একটি ঘুড়ি গাছে আঁটকে যায়। দেখো তো পাখিরা তাদের গাছে আসা সেই অদ্ভুত বস্তুটিকে দেখে কে কী বলে।
children.title: লাল ঘুড়ি
children.author: Harihar Timilsina

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুরের আনকোরা নতুন টুপি আছে! কিন্তু তাদের টুপিগুলো বাতাসে উড়ে হ্রদে গিয়ে পড়ার পর তারা কী করে? আমরা আশা করতে পারি, তাদের কোনো তৃষ্ণার্ত বন্ধু আশেপাশেই আছে।
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং টুপি
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: কুকুর বিড়ালকে কোথাও খুঁজে পাচ্ছে না। আরে, দেখো, গাছে ওটা কী?
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর: বিড়াল কোথায়?
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: বিড়াল ও কুকুর ক্ষুধার্ত। কিন্তু তাদের সুস্বাদু আলু পালিয়ে বেড়ালে তারা কিভাবে খাবে?
children.title: বিড়াল ও কুকুর এবং আলু
children.author: Elke and René Leisink

children.description: বাবু তার বাবার সঙ্গে জাদু প্রদর্শনীতে যাচ্ছে, সেজন্য সে বেশ উত্তেজিত। বাবু কোন জাদুটি বেশি পছন্দ করবে?
children.title: জাদু প্রদর্শনী
children.author: Prabha Bhattarai

children.description: রঙিণ প্রাণি ও বস্তু দশ পর্যন্ত গুণে মজা করো। আর কোন জিনিস তোমাকে দশ পর্যন্ত গুণতে সাহায্য করতে পারে?
children.title: গোণো এবং বলো
children.author: Deepa Dixit

children.description: অনেক হেয়ার স্টাইল আছে। হেয়ার স্টাইল পরিবর্তন করলে তোমাকে কার মতো দেখাবে?
children.title: আমি আজ কিভাবে কেশবিন্যাস করবো?
children.author: Sudha Ojha

children.description: একজন তরুণ তার শিক্ষককে নিয়ে ঝামেলায় আছে, কিন্তু এখানে তার শিক্ষকই শিক্ষা নেয়।
children.title: আবদুল কালাম, আমার শিক্ষকের জন্য একটি শিক্ষা
children.author: Arun Tiwari

children.description: আর্ভি ক্রিকেট খেলা পছন্দ করে। সম্প্রতি সে এমন কয়েকজনের দেখা পেয়েছে যারা তার চাইতে ঢের বেশি ক্রিকেট পছন্দ করে! জেনে নাও এই মজার ক্রিকেট বিশ্বকাপের গল্প।
children.title: চিড়িয়াখানায় ক্রিকেট খেলা
children.author: BookBox

children.description: রাজার একটি গোপন বিদ্যা আছে যা কেউ জানে না। এটি কী হতে পারে?
children.title: রাজার গোপন বিষয়
children.author: Kuzhali Manickavel

children.description: প্রতিরাতে একটি দানব পাখি খাবারের জন্য পোকা ধরতে আসে। পোকারা খুব ভয় পায়। একটি চালাম মেয়ে ঝিঁঝিঁপোকার মাথায় একটি বুদ্ধি আসে। কিন্তু তাকে অন্যদের বুঝিয়ে পরিকল্পনা বাস্তবায়নে একত্র করতে হবে।
children.title: বিশাল মেগাফোন
children.author: Mut Somaly

children.description: শ্রে পভদের গ্রামে আর সূর্য উঠছে না। শ্রে পভ সূর্যের কাছে গিয়ে এর কারণ জানতে চায়। জেনে নাও এই মজার অভিযানে সে কী কী দেখতে পায়।
children.title: সূর্যের সন্ধানে
children.author: Svay Leemeng

children.description: একজন রাজকন্যা কি কখনো কৃষক হতে পারে? নিজেই খুঁজে দেখো।
children.title: কৃষক রাজকন্যা
children.author: Kuzhali Manickavel

children.description: কে বেশি শক্তিশালী: গনগনে সূর্য নাকি অহংকারী বাতাস?
children.title: বাতাস ও সূর্য
children.author: Kuzhali Manickavel

children.description: চার বন্ধু: হরিণ, কচ্ছপ, কাক ও ইঁদুর। তারা শিকারীর ফাঁদ নিয়ে চিন্তিত। তারা কি শিকারীর বুদ্ধিতে হারিয়ে একে অপরকে রক্ষা করতে পারবে?
children.title: চার বন্ধু
children.author: Adapted by BookBox

children.description: সোফি খুব চটপটে এক মৌমাছি। সে দ্রুত উড়ে মধু সংগ্রহ করে, কিন্তু সে অন্য মৌমাছিদের সঙ্গে চলাফেরা করে না। একদিন সোফি তার দল থেকে বিচ্ছিন্ন হয়ে গাছের মগডালে একটি রহস্যময় বেগুনি ফুলের খুঁজতে যায় এবং বিপদে পড়ে। যখন একটি জোনাকি ও তার দলের মৌমাছিরা তাকে উদ্ধার করে, তখন সে বুঝতে পারে বন্ধুত্বের গুরুত্ব।
children.title: ডাগরচোখা মৌমাছি
children.author: Iem Tithseiha

children.description: একটি ছোট বালক সমুদ্র ভালোবাসে। মাছ ও গাছপালা মরে যাচ্ছে দেখে তার মন খারাপ। এদের বাঁচানোর জন্য সে কী করতে পারে?
children.title: বালিতে বার্তা
children.author: Charmaine Aserappa

children.description: নিতা বিজ্ঞান ভালোবাসে। একদিন, সে তার বাড়ির পিছনে পাহাড়ে একটি ধরাম শব্দ শুনতে পায় এবং একটি ‘সবুজ’ বালককে দেখতে পায়। নিতা কিভাবে তার বিজ্ঞানের জ্ঞান কাজে লাগিয়ে ‘সবুজ’ বালককে তার নিজের দেশে ফিরে যেতে সাহায্য করতে পারে?
children.title: সবুজ তারা
children.author: Prum Kunthearo

children.description: চমনান গল্প শুনতে পছন্দ করে। কিন্তু সে প্রচুর প্রশ্ন করে। কিছু কিছু প্রশ্নের উত্তর দেওয়া তার পিতার জন্য কঠিন হয়ে দাঁড়ায়। এক রাতে সে তার গল্পের বইয়ের এক চরিত্রকে স্বপ্নে দেখে। এক রাজকন্যা ডাইনির জাদুমন্ত্রে প্রভাবিত। সকালে সে উত্তেজিত হয়ে তার পিতাকে বইয়ের সেই রাজকন্যার গল্প বলতে বলে।
children.title: গল্পবইয়ের রাজকন্যা
children.author: Prum Kunthearo

children.description: কঙ্কিয়া তার বাবা ও ভাইয়ের সঙ্গে একটি ভাসমান গ্রামের বাস করে। সে তাদের সঙ্গে মাছ ধরতে যেতে চায়, কিন্তু কিন্তু তাকে বাড়িতে থেকে একটি ভাসমান বাগান দেখাশোনা করতে বলা হয়। একদিন, বাগানটি রহস্যজনকভাবে ভাসতে ভাসতে বাড়ি থেকে দূরে চলে যায়। কঙ্কিয়া ঠিক করে, সে প্রথমবারের মতো নৌকা নিয়ে বাগানের সন্ধানে বেরুবে।
children.title: ভাসমান বাগান
children.author: Iem Tithseiha

children.description: এক যোদ্ধা রাজ্যকে খরা থেকে বাঁচানোর জন্য পানির খোঁজে বের হয়। সে ‘পানির বীজ’ নিয়ে বাড়ি ফেরে। পানির বীজ থেকে কি পানি বেরুবে?
children.title: প্রথম কূপ
children.author: Adapted by BookBox

children.description: টিটো ও রিকা মোবাইল ফোন ঝগড়া করে। হঠাৎ করে একটি বাটনে চাপ পড়তেই এক ইউএফও এসে হাজির ঘরের দরজায়। এক এলিয়েন তাদের ইউএফও-তে ওঠার জন্য ডাক দেয়। একটি কুকুরছানা এবং একটি জোনাকি সঙ্গে নিয়ে মহাকাশযানে চড়ে তারা এক অসাধারণ অভিযানে বের হয়। কিন্তু পরদিন সকালে উঠে তারা অবাক... তবে এটা কি শুধুই স্বপ্ন ছিল?
children.title: বিস্ময়কর অভিযান
children.author: Kim Ann Arun

children.description: ষষ্ঠ গ্রেডের এক ছাত্র সাথী। সে চতুর্থ গ্রেডের এক ছাত্রী প্রাচের সঙ্গে চাপাবাজি করছে। প্রাচ কাউকে সাহায্যের জন্য ডাকতে চায়, কিন্তু তার ভয় এতে সাথী আরো কঠোর আচরণ করবে। একদিন, প্রাচের অন্তরঙ্গ বন্ধু ভেটি চাপাবাজির ব্যাপারটা লক্ষ করে এবং তার শিক্ষককে জানায়। বালকেরা এই দ্বন্দ্বের সমাধান করে। এবং এটা করতে গিয়ে তারা বিস্ময়কর অন্তর্দৃষ্টি লাভ করে।
children.title: প্রাচ ও সাথী
children.author: Huot Sarith

children.description: এটি এক বালকের গল্প যে কীনা ফিলিপাইনের আকাশে উড়ে উড়ে দেশটির সৌন্দর্য অবলোকনের কল্পনা করে ও স্বপ্ন দেখে।
children.title: আং বাটাং মারামিং বাওয়াল
children.author: Fernando Rosal Gonzalez

children.description: Have you ever seen a cow with only one horn and no tail?
children.title: Cow With One Horn
children.author: Author: Sebongile Daniel, Mpho Ntlhanngoe, Khothatso Ranoosi. Illustrator: Marion Drew

children.description: Some animals have sharp teeth for biting. Other animals have flat teeth for grinding. Some animals don't have any teeth. What about you?
children.title: What Type Of Teeth?
children.author: Author: Clare Verbeek, Thembani Dladla, Zanele Buthelezi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Chicken and Millipede have a very competitive friendship. One day Chicken becomes so angry for losing that she does something very silly.
children.title: Chicken And Millipede
children.author: Author: Winny Asara. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Short sentences using simple present tense verbs.
children.title: What Are You Doing?
children.author: Author: Nina Orange. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: A story about a boy and his friends,  and the activities they like to do.
children.title: Friends
children.author: Hlengiwe Zondi

children.description: This is a story about a little boy who loves to read stories. He loves it so much that he wants to share a story with his family.
children.title: I Like To Read
children.author: Letta Machoga

children.description: A big red ball goes on a journey.
children.title: My Red Ball
children.author: Author: Marion Drew. Illustrator: Marion Drew

children.description: Sentences that explore feelings and what makes people upset,  happy or sad.
children.title: Happy and Sad
children.author: Author: Madhav Chavan. Illustrator: Rijuta Ghate

children.description: We ask why things are different colours.
children.title: Colours
children.author: Author: Madhav Chavan. Illustrator: Rijuta Ghate

children.description: This little girl loves her teacher,  and wants to be just like her.
children.title: My Teacher
children.author: Author: Hlengiwe Zondi, Zimbili Dlamini. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: A story about a much loved family cow.
children.title: Pendo Our Cow
children.author: Author: Ruth Odondi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Mom is away and Dad is making the morning porridge.
children.title: Porridge
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Musau's father got drunk every night. One night,  he was attacked by a hyena. Would anyone still help him after playing tricks on them all the time?
children.title: Musau And His Father
children.author: Author: Kanyiva Sandi. Illustrator: Benjamin Mitchley

children.description: A story about a hard-working ox and a clever donkey.
children.title: Donkey And Ox
children.author: Author: Melese Getahun Wolde, Elizabeth Laird. Illustrator: Salim Kasamba

children.description: Would you like to have a very special friend? Look into this book and you may find that you already have a very special friend!
children.title: My Best Friend
children.author: Anupa Lal

children.description: Join Chunnu and Munnu as they splash about while having a bath. A fun read-aloud and a great way to say goodnight.
children.title: Bath time for Chunnu and Munnu
children.author: Rohini Nilekani, Illustrator Sonal Goyal, Sumit Sakhuja

children.description: Painting the house is such fun! But what colour should the gate be?
children.title: Little Painters

children.description: A funny little story about three friends and three clever fish!
children.title: "My fish!" "No, my fish!"
children.author: Suraj J Menon Illustrator  Soumya Menon

children.description: Follow the ants in this book. They are sure to keep young readers busy. This book is one of the four books in the 'Animals Around Us' series.
children.title: Busy ants
children.author: Kanchan Bannerjee

children.description: Follow the young deer as he races along with friends.
children.title: Smile Please!
children.author: Sanjiv Jaiswal 'Sanjay' Illustrator  Ajit Narayan, Translator Manisha Chaudhry

children.description: Here, a little boy learns to climb up. But can he climb down? This book is one of the four books in the 'Growing Up' series.
children.title: I Can Climb!

children.description: Elephants once had short noses,  but thanks to a curious baby elephant,  they ended up with useful long trunks.
children.title: Curious Baby Elephant
children.author: Unknown

children.description: This story describes what the wind can do and the effect it has on us.
children.title: Vayu, the Wind
children.author: Author: Madhuri Pai, Rohini Nilekani. Illustrator: Rijuta Ghate

children.description: Colour-in version. Goat,  Dog and Cow are good friends. They take a trip together on a taxi,  but when the time comes to pay the driver one of the friends does something surprising.
children.title: Colour-In Goat, Dog And Cow
children.author: Author: Fabian Wakholi. Illustrator: Marleen Visser

children.description: Have you ever listened to what your body tells you?
children.title: Listen to my Body
children.author: Author: Noni. Illustrator: Angie and  Upesh

children.description: A monkey rides away with Namu’s bicycle!
children.title: Namu's Bicycle
children.author: Author: Munanga ASb teachers. Illustrator: Salim Kasamba

children.description: A girl gets shoes for the first time.
children.title: Happy Akai
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: The land is dry and Little Ant is very thirsty. He goes to the river for a drink and is swept away.
children.title: How Ant Saved Dove
children.author: Kholeka Mabeta

children.description: Lebo has grown out of all her clothes and they are now too small for her. What will she do with them?
children.title: Too Small
children.author: Author: Media Matters. Illustrator: Sandy Lightly

children.description: A short and simple story about a wonderful teacher and what she teaches us.
children.title: Teacher Akinyi
children.author: Lawrence A. Konjuro

children.description: This short story celebrates the abilities of people with disabilities.
children.title: Disability Is Not Inability
children.author: Agnes Mabururu

children.description: In a wild part of Turkana,  a woman leaves her baby under a tree as she climbs in search of fruit. A stranger sees the baby alone. What happens to the baby?
children.title: Child As a Peacemaker
children.author: Author: John Nga'sike. Illustrator: Jacob Kono

children.description: What is the punishment for a greedy boy who ate too much fruit?
children.title: Punishment
children.author: Author: Adelheid Marie Bwire. Illustrator: Melany Pietersen

children.description: Be careful about what might happen when you play a joke on someone.
children.title: Rooster and Hare
children.author: Unknown

children.description: Once there was a family with three very obedient children. The problem was that they were made of wax.
children.title: Children of Wax
children.author: Author: Southern African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Namoratunga in Turkana,  Kenya,  is an ancient site of 19 stone pillars. This story explains how those stones came to be at the site.
children.title: Namorutunga
children.author: Author: Simon Ipoo. Illustrator: Zablon Alex Nguku

children.description: Two children are excited as they prepare to visit their grandmother in her village. They enjoy life in the village so much that they don't want to leave.
children.title: Holidays With Grandmother
children.author: Violet Otieno

children.description: There was a time when there were seven suns in the sky.
children.title: The Seventh Sun: A Tribal Tale From Odisha, India
children.author: Indian Folktale

children.description: Chicken and Millipede have a very competitive friendship. One day Chicken gets so cross about losing that she does something very silly.
children.title: Chicken and Millipede
children.author: Author: Winny Asara. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Three little girls meet a giant who pretends to need help with firewood.
children.title: The Talking Bag
children.author: Caroline Lentupuru

children.description: This tale explains why pigs have flat noses. What else does the story teach us?
children.title: No Pigs Allowed
children.author: Author: Basilio Gimo. Illustrator: Little Zebra Books, Laura Libertore

children.description: A story about rescued baby animals arriving at a nursery for orphans. These little animals are nursed and looked after by a special person and his team of helpers.
children.title: Keeper And His Special Nursery
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula, Nina Orange. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: This young Turkana girl grows up with a most unusual and remarkable mat.
children.title: Akai's Special Mat
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: In this Nyungwe folktale,  we see what happens when Hare refuses to forgive Hippo for stepping on his foot.
children.title: Why Hippos Have No Hair
children.author: Author: Basilio Gimo, David Ker. Illustrator: Carol Liddiment

children.description: Nonkungu was going to visit her uncle and her mother gave her beautiful clothes to wear. On the way to her uncle's village,  Nonkungu meets a strange girl who wants to wear the lovely clothes.
children.title: Nonkungu And The Imbulu
children.author: Viv Kenyon

children.description: On Etabo's sixth birthday,  his mother and aunt take him to town to visit the market for the first time.
children.title: My First Day at the Market
children.author: Timothy Kabare

children.description: The reason why spiders have long thin legs.
children.title: Lazy Anansi
children.author: Author: Ghanaian folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Now you know why goats are so stubborn!
children.title: Goat, The False King
children.author: Author: Alice Nakasango. Illustrator: Marleen Visser

children.description: A boy finds himself on the street with other street children. This is a thoughtful,  challenging story about his life and how it begins to change for the better.
children.title: Magozwe
children.author: Author: Lesley Koyi. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: The birds want a king,  but they have difficulty choosing. They decide that the bird that can fly highest will be made king. The African Vulture thinks he has won the contest,  but a tiny bird tricks him. Do the birds get their king?
children.title: King Of The Birds
children.author: Author: South African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: The little girl is curious as she watches her grandma preparing to ripen bananas.
children.title: Grandma's Bananas
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: It’s a beautiful day for a picnic. Everyone wants to join in the fun.
children.title: A Beautiful Day
children.author: Unknown

children.description: Mouse is looking for a new house. Friendly animals offer to share their homes with him. But nothing is right until he finds his own little spot, warm and cosy.
children.title: A House for Mouse
children.author: Jennifer Jacobs

children.description: In a village on the slopes of Mount Kenya, a little girl worked in the fields with her mother. She worried as she saw the big forests disappearing, but she knew the power of a tiny seed.
children.title: A Tiny Seed: The Story of Wangari Maathai
children.author: Tarryn-Anne Anderson

children.description: Jack’s bath time takes a wild turn as things in his bathtub start to change, and a group of animals becomes part of his adventurous bathtub safari!
children.title: Bathtub Safari
children.author: Unknown

children.description: You don’t need to be alike to be friends. When two very different children meet an unusual creature, it’s a chance to ask, How About You?
children.title: How About You?
children.author: Ronèll Botes

children.description: I wonder if there’s another me somewhere in the world…
children.title: Is There Anyone Like Me?
children.author: Stephen Wallace

children.description: Little Karabo watches all the grown-ups in her family, and wonders, ‘What do I do? What do I know?’
children.title: Karabo's Question
children.author: Marike Beyleveld

children.description: Londi loves to dream all day. But where will her dreams take her?
children.title: Londi the dreaming girl
children.author: Nathalie Koenig

children.description: Phyllis Spira was dancing by the age of four. That was just the beginning of her journey towards becoming one of South Africa’s Prima Ballerinas.
children.title: A Dancer's Tale: The Story of Phyllis Spira
children.author: Roberto Pita

children.description: A delightful tale about an independent cat.
children.title: Come Back, Cat!
children.author: Sam Scarborough

children.description: This is the story of Helen Martins’ battle against darkness, told by one of the creatures she loved best, the wise old owl.
children.title: Miss Helen's Magical World: The Story of Helen Martins
children.author: Nadene Kriel

children.description: On a little farm lives Daisy, a little chicken who wishes she could fly. All the other chickens laugh at her daily flying practice. But one day something amazing happens …
children.title: Amazing Daisy
children.author: Leona Ingram

children.description: The inspiring story of Graça Machel, and her dream to instill a love for reading and learning in the children of Mozambique and the rest of Africa.
children.title: Graca's Dream
children.author: Marike le Roux

children.description: Lory Dory was born invisible. No one understands that she is real. Until, one day, she finds a way to show them who she is.
children.title: Lory Dory
children.author: Arthur Attwell

children.description: Basetsana Kumalo is a beauty queen, but she’s also so much more. She teaches us that true beauty is about having a heart filled with love and generosity. Her story shows us that if you have courage and determination, you can achieve your dreams – whatever they may be.
children.title: Queen of Soweto: The Story of Basetsana Kumalo
children.author: Marli Fourie

children.description: Yusuf waits on the beach while Papa pushes out his boat. Surfers, turtles and sharks come from the sea. What will Papa bring back for Yusuf?
children.title: A Fish and A Gift
children.author: Unknown

children.description: When Mama Heron needs help, Lungile comes to her rescue.
children.title: I Will Help You
children.author: Andrea Abbott

children.description: The children are talking about their grandpas. Giraffe’s grandpa can build a skyscraper. Elephant’s grandpa can cook a massive feast. But whose grandpa will give the children the biggest surprise?
children.title: Grandpa's Gold
children.author: Mathilde de Blois

children.description: This is a story about a little ant with a big plan, and how his love for reading saved the day.
children.title: Little Ant's Big Plan
children.author: Steven McKimmie and Telri Stoop

children.description: Rafiki’s style is all his own, but when the Cool Cat Crew struts by, he starts to wonder if it’s good enough.
children.title: Rafiki's Style
children.author: Wesley Thompson

children.description: Ku qanannaaxxi hara’mash kitaab Yu.Es.Ay.Di (USAID)eennsi siidamukki diinaxxi hara’matinne, Seev Ze Childireeninne (Save the Children), Losa’n Ministeerinnee Dabuuphphi Giir Giichchi Gassi Losa’n biiro’innee maqirem angejjinne gudaa koobamukko. 2008 H.D
children.title: Waasa Gudisakkamisa
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: Ku qanannaaxxi hara’mash kitaab Yu.Es.Ay.Di (USAID)eennsi siidamukki diinaxxi hara’matinne, Seev Ze Childireeninne (Save the Children), Losa’n Ministeerinnee Dabuuphphi Giir Giichchi Gassi Losa’n biiro’innee maqirem angejjinne gudaa koobamukko. 2008 H.D
children.title: Dirisiinsi Gatu Beeto
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: Ku qanannaaxxi hara’mash kitaab Yu.Es.Ay.Di (USAID)eennsi siidamukki diinaxxi hara’matinne, Seev Ze Childireeninne (Save the Children), Losa’n Ministeerinnee Dabuuphphi Giir Giichchi Gassi Losa’n biiro’innee maqirem angejjinne gudaa koobamukko. 2008 H.D
children.title: Tiiraamee Ersaamii
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: Ku qanannaaxxi hara’mash kitaab Yu.Es.Ay.Di (USAID)eennsi siidamukki diinaxxi hara’matinne, Seev Ze Childireeninne (Save the Children), Losa’n Ministeerinnee Dabuuphphi Giir Giichchi Gassi Losa’n biiro’innee maqirem angejjinne gudaa koobamukko.2008 H.D

children.title: Yannoor Hantaaro Urimma
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: Ngithanda ukweqa nabangani. Wena uthanda ukwenza ini?
children.title: Ngithanda ukwenza
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Indatjana imayelana nekomo ethandwako emndenini.
children.title: UPendo ikomo yekhethu
children.author: Author: Ruth Odondi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Umma akekho,  ubaba upheka umdoko wekuseni.
children.title: Umdoko
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Iza nawe mngani. Wena uthanda ukwenza ini?
children.title: Abangani
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Umntazanyana omncani ufuna ukufana notitjhere wakhe.
children.title: Utitjhere wami
children.author: Author: Hlengiwe Zondi, Zimbili Dlamini. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Le yindatjana emayelana nomsanyana othanda ukufunda iindatjana. Uzithanda khulu ngalendlela yokobana ufuna ukwabelana ngendatjana nomndeni wakhe.
children.title: Ngithanda ukufunda
children.author: Author: Letta Machoga. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Ibholo ekulu ebovu ithatha ikhambo elide.
children.title: Ibholo yami ebovu
children.author: Author: Marion Drew. Illustrator: Marion Drew

children.description: Abantu abakhubazekileko banamanye amakghono neemphiwo njengawo woke umuntu.
children.title: Ukukhubazeka akusikho ukubhalelwa
children.author: Author: Agnes Mabururu. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Ifene ikhamba ngetsikiri kaNamu! Abentwana bagijimisa ifene.
children.title: Itsikiri kaNamu
children.author: Author: Munanga ASb teachers. Illustrator: Salim Kasamba

children.description: USizwe ubona umsana owembethe irhembe ehle,  bewafisa kwangathi naye angaba nalo.
children.title: Ilanga lakaSizwe letjhudu
children.author: Author: Adelheid Marie Bwire. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Indawo yomile utjhontjhwani womele amanzi khulu. Waya emlanjeni wayokusela bewakhamba. Utjhontjhwani usindisa izuba.
children.title: Utjhontjhwani usindisa izuba
children.author: Author: Judith Baker, Kholeka Mabeta. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Indatjana imayelana nabentwana beenlwana abahlengiweko abafika eentandanini. Iinlwanyana lezi zitlhogonyelwa mumuntu okhethekileko nethimba lakhe.
children.title: UMgcini nendawo yakhe ekhethekileko
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula, Nina Orange. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Isikhukhukazi noSongololo banobungani obunephaliswano elikhulu. Ngelinye ilanga ikukhu yathukuthela khulu ngokungaphumeleli ngombana yenza into engazisiko.
children.title: Isikhukhukazi noSongololo
children.author: Author: Winny Asara. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Umntwana wendlovu bekanemibuzo ngezinto zoke,  okufaka hlangana nokuthi igulukudela lidla ini entambama.
children.title: Umntwana wendlovu ofuna ukwazi
children.author: Author: Judith Baker, Lorato Trok. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: UVusi nonina balinde iBhesi ekulu ehlaza okwesibhakabhaka ukobana izobathwala ibase edorobheni,  kodwana ibhesi ehlaza kwesibhakabhaka le beyiphukile. Alo,  sebazokufika njani edorobheni.
children.title: Ibhesi ekulu ehlaza sasibhakabhaka
children.author: Author: Mecelin Kakoro. Illustrator: Mango Tree

children.description: Isikhukhukazi sadlala ihlaya elimbi ekhozini.
children.title: Isikhukhukazi sakhohlisa ikhozi
children.author: Author: Nathan Higenyi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: NgoMgqibelo ngemuva kwamadina kutjhisa khulu,  abentwana abathathu bayokudlala eduze nomlambo. Nalokha bangakavunyelwa bona badude,  bahlubula bathoma ukuthelana ngamanzi. Kwenzeka ini ngezambatho zabo?
children.title: NgoMgqibelo otjhisako ngemva kwamadina
children.author: Author: Tessa Welch. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: UMaguru ucabanga ukunikela zoke iimbandana imileze ukuze zithabele ukukhamba zifane nabantu.
children.title: UMaguru unikela imilenze
children.author: Author: Mutugi Kamundi. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: UPalesa ukhuluma nemithi,  utjani namathuthumbo.
children.title: UPalesa uthanda iintjalo
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Indatjana yethando emayelana nekosazana ehle eyalandela ihliziyo yayo,  kunokulandela iimfiso zakayise.
children.title: Ikosi uSogada nendodakazi yayo
children.author: Author: Amana Yunus. Illustrator: Natalie Propa

children.description: Abentazana abathathu bayokutheza iinkuni. Ngokungalandeli isiyeleliso sakagogo wabo,  omunye wabentazana wenza into eyingozi khulu.
children.title: Ihlathi leenyoka
children.author: Author: Joseph Sanchez Nadimo. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Iinyoni zifuna ukukhetha ikosi. Ngubani ozokuba yikosi?
children.title: Ikosi yeenyoni
children.author: Author: South African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Umsana uzithola ahlala endleleni nabanye abentwana. Le yindatjana ngobuphilo bakhe nokuthi buthoma njani ukutjhuguluka bube ngcono.
children.title: UMagozwe
children.author: Author: Lesley Koyi. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Abentwana ababili bathabile njengombana bazilungiselela ukuvakatjhela ugogo wabo emakhaya.
children.title: Amalanga wokuphumula nogogo
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Ingabe uNangila uzokuphumelela lapha kuhluleke khona amadoda anamandla?
children.title: Ukuzimisela kukaNangila
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Vusi Malindi

children.description: Lokha umqasa usalele ngaphasi komuthi wamahabhula,  ihabhula lawena phasi. Khona lapho umqasa wezwa ilizwi lirhuwelela "Baleka mqasa baleka!"
children.title: Umqasa ngaphasi komuthi
children.author: Author: Phumy Zikode. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: UNonkungu bekayokuvakatjhela umalume wakhe. Unina wamnikela isikerde esifakwe umncamo kobana asembathe. Endleleni wahlangana nomntazana owabawa uNokungu kobana amboleke isikerde sakhe esihle khulu.
children.title: UNonkungu nembulu
children.author: Author: Alan Kenyon, Viv Kenyon. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: UNkanyezi akazange akghone ukulinda umoya wetwasahlobo,  kodwana abantu bakwaNdlovu balahlekelwe mumoya wokugidinga.
children.title: Ukuzuma umoya wethwasahlobo
children.author: Author: Mosa Mahlaba. Illustrator: Selina Masego Morulane

children.description: Ye ke kanegelo kopana ka ya mosemane wa go rata go bala dikanegelo. O rata go bala kudu ka fao a rata go anegela ba le lapa la gabo ka kanegelo yeo a e badilego.
children.title: Ke Rata Go Bala
children.author: Author: Letta Machoga. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Etlang,  bagwera,  na le rata go dira eng?
children.title: Bagwera
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Kgwele ye kgolo ye hubedu e tšea leeto.
children.title: Kgwele Ya Ka Ye Hubedu
children.author: Author: Marion Drew. Illustrator: Marion Drew

children.description: Mosetsana o nyaka go swana le morutiši wa gagwe.
children.title: Morutiši Wa Ka
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Mma ga a gona gomme tate o apea motepa wa go fihlola.
children.title: Motepa
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Kanegelo ka ga kgomo ya mmamoratwa.
children.title: Pendo Kgomo Ya Rena
children.author: Author: Ruth Odondi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Elephants once had short noses,  but thanks to a curious baby elephant,  they ended up with useful long trunks.
children.title: Tlowana Ya Go Rata Go Tseba
children.author: Author: Judith Baker, Lorato Trok. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Naga e omile. Tšhošwane e swerwe ke lenyora. E leba nokeng go yo nwa meetse efela e rwalwa ke meetse. Leeba le ile la phološa bophelo bja Tšhošwane. Na Tšhošwane e tla leboga Leeba bjang?
children.title: Tšhošwane E Phološa Leeba
children.author: Author: Kholeka Mabeta, Judith Baker. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Na o rata go dira eng?
children.title: Tšeo Ke Ratago Go Dira
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Palesa o bolela le mehlare,  bjang le matšoba.
children.title: Palesa O Rata Dimela
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Bagolofadi ba na le mabokgoni a mantši le dimpho,  go swana le batho ka moka.
children.title: Bogolofadi Ga Se Go Se Kgone
children.author: Author: Agnes Mabururu. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Kgogo e raloka maleatlana a šoro go Ntšhu.
children.title: Kgogo E Hlalefetša Ntšhu
children.author: Author: Nathan Higenyi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Ebei le mmagwe ba emetše pese ye kgolo ye talalerata go ba iša toropong efela pese ye talalerata e senyegile. Na ba tla fihla bjang kua toropong?
children.title: Pese Ye Kgolo Ye Talalerata
children.author: Author: Mecelin Kakoro. Illustrator: Mango Tree

children.description: Kalabuše ke mosetsana wa go loka yoo a ratago go tseba le go bolela kudu. Seo se mo tsentšha mathateng efela sa mo thuša gape. Naa o ithuta eng ka Kalabuše.
children.title: Kalabuše Wa Go Bolela Kudu
children.author: Author: Gaspah Juma. Illustrator: Jesse Breytenbach

children.description: Kgogo le legokolodi e be e le bagwera. Kgogo e ile ya kgopisega ge a lewa ke legokolodi. Go tloga tsatsing leo kgogo le legokolodi ya ba manaba a magolo.
children.title: Kgogo Le Legokolodi
children.author: Author: Winny Asara. Illustrator: Winny Asara

children.description: Kanegelo ye e bolela ka bana ba diphoofolo tšeo di tlišitšwego lefelong la tlhokomelo ya bana ba diphoofolo tša ditšhuana. Diphoofolo tšeo di hlokomelwa ke motho wa go kgethega le sehlopha sa gagwe.
children.title: Mothuši Le Lefelo La Gagwe La Go Ikgetha La Go Hlokomela
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula, Nina Orange. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Na Nangila a ka kgona mola banna ba bogale ba paletšwe?
children.title: Nangila, Mosetsana Wa Sebete
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Vusi Malindi

children.description: Dinonyana di nyaka go kgetha kgoši. Na e tlaba mang?
children.title: Kgoši Ya Dinonyana
children.author: Author: South African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Kanegelo ke ya mosetsanyana yoo ba rego ke Khayanga. O be a sotlega morago ga gore batswadi ba gagwe ba hlokofale. Yena o ile a ya mabitleng a bona go nyaka thušo. Mohlolo wa nkgo wa diragala gona mabitleng ao gomme go tloga tšatši leo,  Khayanga a bona thušo go tšwa batswading ba gagwe.
children.title: Khayanga Le Nkgo Ya Gagwe
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Mmutla o rile o robetše ka tlase ga mohlare wa moapola,  apola ya wela fase. Ka yona nako yeo,  Mmutla wa kwa lentšu le goeletša le re,  "Tšhaba Mmutla,  tšhaba!"
children.title: Mmutla Ka Tlase Ga Mohlare
children.author: Author: Phumy Zikode. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Nonkungu o be aeya go etelamalomewagagwe. Mmagwe o moapešitšesekhethe se sebotsesa go ba le dipheta. Mo tselengya go yagamalomewagagwe,  Nonkungu o kopana le mosetsanayoo a mokgopetšego go itekanyasekhethesagagwe se sebotse. Ge Nonkunguae fa mosetsanadiaparotšagagwe gore a di apare,  Nonkungu o lemoga gore mosetsanayoo o na le mosela le gonakeimbulu.
children.title: Nonkungu Le Imbulu
children.author: Author: Alan Kenyon, Viv Kenyon. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.title: Axmed Iyo qoyskooda
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: Kuyangijabulisa kwenta letintfo lengitibalile. Ngabe ujabulela kwentaini?
children.title: Lengijabulela kukwenta
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Indzaba lephatselene nekhomo leyayitsandvwa ngumndeni wayo.
children.title: Pendo yinkhomo yakitsi
children.author: Author: Ruth Odondi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Lendzaba imayelana nemfana lomncane lotsandza kufundza tindzaba. Utsandza kakhulu ngendlela yekutsi ufuna kucocela umndeni wakhe lenye yetindzaba latifundzile.
children.title: Ngiyakutsandza kufundza
children.author: Author: Letta Machoga. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Make akekho. Babe upheka lijingi. Make upheka lijingi lelimnandzi.
children.title: Lijingi
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Intfombatane lencane ifuna kufana nathishela wayo.
children.title: Thishela wami
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Buyani,  bangani,  ngabe nitsandza kwentani?
children.title: Bangani
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Libhola lelinkhulu lelibovu litsatse luhambo.
children.title: Libhola lami lelibovu
children.author: Author: Marion Drew. Illustrator: Marion Drew

children.description: Bantfu labakhubatekile banalokunyenti labangakwenta futsi banemakhono.
children.title: Akusho kutsi batehluleki
children.author: Author: Agnes Mabururu. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Hamisi ubona umfana logcoke sikipa lesihle,  ufisa kutsi naye angaba naso.
children.title: Lusuku lwaHamisi lwenhlanhla
children.author: Author: Adelheid Marie Bwire. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Ingobiyane yabonakala seyigibele libhayisikili laNamu ihamba nalo.
children.title: Libhayisikili laNamu
children.author: Author: Munanga ASb teachers. Illustrator: Salim Kasamba

children.description: Indzaba lemfishane lelula lemayelana nathishela lolungile nekutsi usifundzisani.
children.title: Thishela Nkosi
children.author: Author: Lawrence A. Konjuro. Illustrator: Vusi Malindi

children.description: Khabo abeyintfombatane letsandza bantfu naletsandza tintfo kantsi futsi bekakutsandza nekukhuluma. Lokukwamfaka enkingeni,  kodvwa kwabuye kwamsita kutsi akhone kubaleka. Sifundvo sini losifundze ngaKhabo.
children.title: Intfombatana letsandza kukhuluma
children.author: Author: Gaspah Juma. Illustrator: Jesse Breytenbach

children.description: Lendzaba iphatselene nekuhlengwa kwebantfwana betilwane letitintsandzane letiletfwa kulesiciwi. Letilwane letincane tiyanakekelwa ngumgcinisiciwi kanye netisebenti takhe.
children.title: Umlindzi siciwi setilwane nekunakekela
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula, Nina Orange. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Sikhukhukati ukhohlise Lukhoti wadlala ngaye.
children.title: Sikhukhukati ukhohlisa Lukhoti
children.author: Author: Nathan Higenyi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Umntfwana wendlovu bekanemibuto ngato tonkhe tintfo,  lokufaka ekhatsi kutsi tingwenya tidlani.
children.title: Indlovu leyayitsandza tintfo
children.author: Author: Judith Baker, Lorato Trok. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: BoJojo namake wakhe balindze ibhasi lenkhulu leluhlata sasibhakabhaka kutsi ibayise edolobheni. Kodvwa ibhasi leluhlata sasibhakabhaka iphukile. Ngabe batawufika njani edolobheni?
children.title: Ibhasi lenkhulu leluhlata sasibhakabhaka
children.author: Author: Mecelin Kakoro. Illustrator: Mango Tree

children.description: Palesa ukhulumisa tihlahla,  tjani kanye netimbali.
children.title: Palesa utsandza titjalo
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Inkhukhu nelishongololo bebangebangani labakhulu. Ngalelinye lilanga inkhukhu yatfukutsela kakhulu mhla itfola kutsi yente intfo lembi kakhulu leyayingafanele iyente.
children.title: Inkhukhu nelishongololo
children.author: Author: Winny Asara. Illustrator: Magriet Brink

children.description: Kunesomiso intfutfwana yome kakhulu. Iphuma iye emfuleni konatsa emanti,  isanatsa ikhukhulwa ngemanti. Intfutfwane ilibonga kanjani liTuba.
children.title: Indlela iNtfutfwane lasindzisa ngayo liTuba
children.author: Author: Kholeka Mabeta, Judith Baker. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Mveli uncuma kunikela ngemilente kutotonkhe tilwane kute tijabulele kuhamba njengebantfu.
children.title: Mveli unikela ngemilente
children.author: Author: Mutugi Kamundi. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Emantfombatana lamatsatfui ahamba ayewutfota tinkhuni ehlatsini. Abazange balalele nakabayala gogo wabo,  yinye intfombatana yenta intfo letsite leyingoti.
children.title: Mambakati, inyoka yelihlatsi
children.author: Author: Joseph Sanchez Nadimo. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Bantfwana lababili bajabulile balungiselela kuyovakashela gogo wabo emaphandleni. Bayayijabulela imphilo yasemaphandleni ngendlela yekutsi batsi nababuyela ekhaya,  bafise kwangatsi bangaphindze babuyele futsi.
children.title: Ngesikhatsi semaholide nagogo
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Tinyoni tifuna kukhetsa inkhosi. Ngubani lotawuba yinkhosi?
children.title: Inkhosi yetinyoni
children.author: Author: South African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Umfana watitfola emgwacweni nalabanye bantfwana lebahlala emgwacweni. Lena yindzaba lephatselene nemphilo lebeyingasiyinhle nekutsi yantjintja njani.
children.title: Wonkhe umuntfu uneliphupho
children.author: Author: Lesley Koyi. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Ngalelinye lilanga ntsambama kwakushisa,  bantfwana labatsatfu bahamba bayodlala edvute nemfula. Nobe bebangakavunyelwa kuhlamba kodvwa bakhumula timphahla bangena emantini. Ngabe kwentekani ngetimphahla tabo?
children.title: UMgcibelo lowawushisa kakhulu
children.author: Author: Tessa Welch. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Indzaba yelutsandvo mayelana nenkhosatana lenhlele yalandzela inhlitiyo yayo,  kunekutsi yenta lokobekufiswe ngubabe wayo.
children.title: Inkhosi Cebekhulu nendvodzakati yayo
children.author: Author: Amana Yunus. Illustrator: Natalie Propa

children.description: Ngabe Nolwazi utawuphumelela lapho kuhluleke emadvodza lanemandla?
children.title: Sibindzi saNolwazi
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Vusi Malindi

children.description: Kwatsi asatilalele logwaja ngaphasi kwesihlahla,  kwawa lihhabhula etukwakhe. Ngasoleso sikhatsi logwaja weva livi limemeta,  "Baleka logwaja baleka!"
children.title: Logwaja ngaphasi kwesihlahla
children.author: Author: Phumy Zikode. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Nozizwe wayovakashela malume wakhe,  make wakhe wamnika liloko lelihle lelihlotjiswe ngebuhlalu lobuhle,  waligcoka wahamba. Endlelni leya kamalume wakhe,  Nozizwe wahlangana nentfombatana leyamcela kutsi amboleke liloko lakhe kantsi yona yayigcoke emanikiniki. Ngalesikhatsi bantjintjisana timphahla,  Nozizwe wabona umsila kulentfombatane,  wabona kutsi iyimbulu.
children.title: Nozizwe nembulu
children.author: Author: Alan Kenyon, Viv Kenyon. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Nkhanyeti akasakwati nekutibamba ujabulele kugubha umkhosi wekungena kweNtfwasahlobo,  kodvwa bantfu baseMkhwakhweni bese balahlekelwe ngumdlandla.
children.title: Kugubha umkhosi weNtfwasahlobo
children.author: Author: Mosa Mahlaba. Illustrator: Selina Masego Morulane

children.description: Mme ha a yo mme Ntate o pheha motoho.
children.title: Motoho
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Abraham Muzee, Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Tloho,  motswalle,  wena o rata ho etsang?
children.title: Metswalle
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Catherine Groenewald

children.description: Ena ke pale ka moshemaneya ratang ho bala dipale. O rata ho bala haholo hoo a ratang ho arolelana pale le ba lelapa labo.
children.title: Ke rata ho bala
children.author: Author: Letta Machoga. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Bolo e kgolo e kgubedu e nka leeto.
children.title: Bolo ya ka e kgubedu
children.author: Author: Marion Drew. Illustrator: Marion Drew

children.description: Ngwananyana o batla ho tshwana le mosuwetsana wa hae.
children.title: Mosuwetsana wa ka
children.author: Author: Zimbili Dlamini, Hlengiwe Zondi. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Pale ya kgomo e ratwang haholo ya lelapa.
children.title: Kgomo eso Pendo
children.author: Author: Ruth Odondi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Thato le mmae ba emetse bese e kgolo e mmala wa botala ba lehodimo ho ba isa toropong. Ebe ba tla fihla toropong?
children.title: Bese ya mmala wa botala ba lehodimo
children.author: Author: Mecelin Kakoro. Illustrator: Mango Tree

children.description: Naha e omme haholo mme Kokonyana e monyenyane o nyorilwe haholo. O ya nokeng ho ya nwa mme o hoholwa ke metsi. Leeba o pholosa bophelo ba Kokonyana e monyenyane. Ebe Kokonyana e monyenyane o leboha Leeba jwang?
children.title: Kokonyana o pholosa Leeba
children.author: Author: Kholeka Mabeta, Judith Baker. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Palesa o bua le difate,  jwang le dipalesa.
children.title: Palesa o rata dimela
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Jesse Pietersen

children.description: Ledinyane la tlou le ne le na le dipotso ka tsohle,  hammoho le hore na kwena e jang bakeng sa dijo tsa mantsiboya.
children.title: Nko ya tlou
children.author: Author: Judith Baker, Lorato Trok. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Tshepo o bona moshanyana ya apereng hempe e ntle,  mme o lakatsa ho ba le yona le yena.
children.title: Letsatsi la Tshepo la lehlohonolo
children.author: Author: Adelheid Marie Bwire. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Tshwene e baleha ka baesekele ya Seipati.
children.title: Baesekele ya Seipati
children.author: Author: Munanga ASb teachers. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Ke eng seo o ratang ho se etsa?
children.title: Ke rata ho etsa
children.author: Author: Ursula Nafula. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Pale e kgutshwane e bonolo ka mosuwetsana ya ratehang le seo a re rutang sona.
children.title: Mosuwetsana Akinyi
children.author: Author: Lawrence A. Konjuro. Illustrator: Vusi Malindi

children.description: Batho ba nang le boqhwala ba na le bokgoni le ditalente tse ngata.
children.title: Ho ba le boqhwala ha se ho hloka bokgoni
children.author: Author: Agnes Mabururu. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Bana ba babedi ba thabile ha ba itokisetsa ho etela nkgono wa bona motseng wa hae. Ba rata bophelo ba metseng haholo hoo ha ba lokela ho kgutlela hae,  ba yeng ba hopole ho eta hape.
children.title: Matsatsi a phomolo le nkgono
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Kgoho o bapala maqiti a mabe ka Ntsu.
children.title: Kgoho o jalletsa Ntsu
children.author: Author: Nathan Higenyi. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Maguru o ile qeta ka ho fa diphoofolo tsohle maoto hore di thabele ho tsamaya jwaloka batho.
children.title: Maguru o fana ka maoto
children.author: Author: Mutugi Kamundi. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Mantsiboyeng a mang a tjhesang haholo,  bana ba bararo ba ya ho ya bapala haufi le noka. Leha ba ne ba sa dumellwa ho sesa,  ba ile ba iphumana ba hlobola mme ba qala ho tshelana ka metsi. Ho etsahalang ka diaparo tsa bona?
children.title: Moqebelo o mong o tjhesang haholo
children.author: Author: Nombulelo Thabane, Tessa Welch. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Moitheri o na le setswalle hape o dula a rata ho tseba haholwanyane,  ebile o rata ho bua. Sena se mo kenya mathateng,  empa se boetse se mo thusa ho phonyoha. Ke sefe seo o ithutang sona ho Moitheri?
children.title: Moitheri ya buang haholo
children.author: Author: Gaspah Juma. Illustrator: Jesse Breytenbach

children.description: Neo o ne a tla etela malome wa hae mme mmae a mo fa mose o nang le difaha ho o tena. Tseleng e yang motseng wa malomae,  Neo o ile a kopana le ngwanana ya ileng a mo kopa ho apara mose wa hae. Ha ba fapanyetsana diaparo Neo a bona mohatla wa ngwanana mme a elellwa hore ke lempetje!
children.title: Neo le lempetje
children.author: Author: Alan Kenyon, Viv Kenyon. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Ebe Bonolo o tla atleha moo banna ba matla ba hlolehileng teng?
children.title: Mamello ya Bonolo
children.author: Author: Violet Otieno. Illustrator: Vusi Malindi

children.description: Dinonyana di batla ho kgetha morena. E tla ba mang?
children.title: Morena wa dinonyana
children.author: Author: South African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Ha Mmutlanyana a robetse tlasa sefate sa diapole,  apole ya wela fatshe. Ka yona nako eo,  Mmutlanyana a utlwa lentswe le hweletsang "Matha mmutlanyana Matha!"
children.title: Mmutlanyana tlasa sefate
children.author: Author: Phumy Zikode. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Banana ba bararo ba ne ba rwalla patsi morung. Leha ho bile le tlhokomediso ho tswa ho nkgono wa bona,  e mong wa banana etsa ntho e kotsi.
children.title: Moru wa dinoha
children.author: Author: Joseph Sanchez Nadimo. Illustrator: Rob Owen

children.description: Pale ya lerato e hlomolang ya kgosatsana e nyenyane e ntle e neng e ikgethela se ratwang ke pelo ya hae,  ho e na le ho latela ditakatso tsa ntatae.
children.title: Morena Kadi le moradi wa hae
children.author: Author: Amana Yunus. Illustrator: Natalie Propa

children.description: Naledi ha a kgone ho emela mokete wa Hwetla,  empa Batloung ba lahlehetswe ke moya wa bona wa ho keteka.
children.title: Ho batlana le moya wa hwetla
children.author: Author: Mosa Mahlaba. Illustrator: Selina Masego Morulane

children.description: Mama anaenda hospitalini kujifungua mtoto na bintiye anamwandikia barua.
children.title: Barua kwa Mama
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: A story about a much loved family cow.
children.title: Ng'ombe wetu Pendo
children.author: Ruth Odondi

children.description: Kulinganisha vitu vikubwa na vidogo.
children.title: Kubwa na Ndogo
children.author: Carole Bloch

children.description: Tunawauliza mama na baba sababu ya vitu kuwa na rangi tofauti.
children.title: Taja Rangi
children.author: Madhav Chavan

children.description: Hi ni hadithi ya kuvutia kumhusu Wangari Maathai.
children.title: Wangari Maathai
children.author: Nicola Rijsdijk

children.description: Hadithi inaonyesha nguvu za upepo.
children.title: Upepo mkali
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: Wanyama mbali mbali wana meno tofauti.
children.title: Meno aina gani?
children.author: Clare Verbeek

children.description: Hii ni hadithi ya Kuku na Jongoo (kiwango cha 4),  ambayo imebadilishwa kufaa kiwango cha 1.
children.title: Kuku na Jongoo
children.author: Winny Asara

children.description: Vitendo vya kawaida.
children.title: Unafanya Nini?
children.author: Nina Orange

children.description: Hadithi inasimulia matendo msichana mdogo anayafanya ambayo yanafanya kuwa mashuhuri. Je,  kwa nini?
children.title: Kwa nini Yayeri ni mashuhuri?
children.author: Michael Oguttu

children.description: Msimulizi wa hadithi kutoka Turkana anatufundisha kuhusu umuhimu na matumizi ya mtende.
children.title: Umuhimu wa Mtende
children.author: Simon Ipoo

children.description: Marafiki wanafanya mambo tofauti pamoja.
children.title: Marafiki
children.author: Hlengiwe Zondi

children.description: Wanakijiji wanaungana kubadilisha maisha yao.
children.title: Umoja
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: Fahali anafanya kazi ngumu lakini Punda hamuamini.
children.title: Punda na Fahali
children.author: Elizabeth Laird

children.description: Mbwa anakuta mayai kando ya mto na kuyapeleka nyumbani. Je,  mama mamba atasemaje atakapogundua?
children.title: Mamba na Mbwa
children.author: Candiru Enzikuru Mary

children.description: Mtoto anajitahidi sana kumpata mtu wa kumsomea.
children.title: Ninapenda Kusoma
children.author: Letta Machoga

children.description: Wanyama wote wana kiu. Wahesabu wanapoenda kunywa maji.
children.title: Kuwahesabu Wanyama
children.author: Clare Verbeek

children.description: Mvulana mdogo anajipata mtaani pamoja na watoto wengine wanaorandaranda. Katika hali ya kujitafutia,  anakutana na mtu ambaye anabadilisha maisha yake.
children.title: Magozwe
children.author: Lesley Koyi

children.description: Mama hayuko nyumbani na Baba anatayarisha uji wa asubuhi.
children.title: Uji
children.author: Hlengiwe Zondi

children.description: Mitungo inayochunguza hisia na kinachowafanya watu kukasirika,  kufurahi au kuhuzunika.
children.title: Furaha na Huzuni
children.author: Madhav Chavan

children.description: Babake Musau alilewa kila usiku. Siku moja alivamiwa na fisi lakini watu walikuwa wamechoka naye. Je,  nani atamsaidia?
children.title: Musau na babake
children.author: Kanyiva Sandi

children.description: Hadithi hii inatuonyesha sababu sungura anakimbia kwa kasi na jinsi alivyomdanganya rafikiye tembo.
children.title: Sungura amdanganya Tembo
children.author: Agnes Gichaba

children.description: Jumamosi moja alasiri watoto watatu wanaenda kucheza karibu na mto. Wanapotaka kwenda nyumbani tena,  hawazipati nguo zao. Watajielezaje kwa mamao?
children.title: Jumamosi moja
children.author: Tessa Welch

children.description: Ebei na mamake wanasubiri basi kubwa ya bluu kuwasafirisha kwenda mjini. Lakini basi ya bluu iliharibika. Je,  watawezaje kufika mjini?
children.title: Basi kubwa la bluu
children.author: Mecelin Kakoro

children.description: Mama na baba wanapanda bustani. Pamoja familia inafanya kazi ya kupanda na kuvuna.
children.title: Mamangu alipanda
children.author: Tom Sabwa

children.description: Palikuwa na familia moja ya watoto watatu watiifu. Ilikuwa shida kwani walikuwa watoto wa nta kwa hivyo walifanya shughuli zote usiku kwa kuhofia kuyeyushwa na jua kali. Lakini mvulana mmoja anatamani sana kuiona dunia mchana na hivyo anatoka na kutembea nje. Bila shaka,  anayeyushwa na joto jingi la jua. Nduguze wanavunjika mioyo lakini wanapanga jinsi ya kumsaidia ndugu yao.
children.title: Watoto walioumbwa kwa nta
children.author: Author: Southern African Folktale. Illustrator: Wiehan de Jager

children.description: Mbeleni,  tembo walikuwa na pua fupi,  lakini,  kwa ajili ya udadisi wa mtoto wa tembo,  tembo wote walipata mikonga mirefu.
children.title: Mtoto wa Tembo Mdadisi
children.author: Lorato Trok

children.description: Nguo zote za Nelima ni ndogo mno kwake. Atazifanyaje?
children.title: Ndogo sana, Kubwa sana
children.author: Media Matters

children.description: Katika sehemu za pori za Turkana,  mwanamke anamwacha mtoto wake chini ya mti naye anaupanda mti kutafuta matunda. Mgeni alimwona mtoto akiwa peke yake. Je,  mambo yanakuwa namna gani kwa mtoto?
children.title: Mtoto aliyeleta Amani
children.author: John Nga'sike

children.description: Akai amefurahi kupata viatu vyake vipya vya kwanza.
children.title: Akai afurahi
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: Hadithi katika lugha mbili inayoelezea vitu vyote ambavyo msichana mdogo anafurahia kutenda.
children.title: Ninafurahi / I Enjoy
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: Msichana anakwama kwenye jiwe na mamake anatafuta njia ya kumlinda. Lakini,  Fisi mwenye tamaa,  alikuwa na mpango wake mwenyewe.
children.title: Fisi mlafi
children.author: John Nga'sike

children.description: Hadithi hii inaelezea jinsi ambavyo upepo unavyotenda na athari zake kwetu.
children.title: Vayu, Upepo
children.author: Rohini Nilekani

children.description: Hamisi alipokuwa akinunua sare ya shule na babake,  alimwona mvulana aliyevaa shati la kijanikiwiti la kuvutia. Je,  Hamisi atafaulu kumshawishi babake kumnunulia shati kama hilo?
children.title: Hamisi abahatika
children.author: Adelheid Marie Bwire

children.description: Mvulana mdogo alitumwa dukani na bibiye kununua vitu vichache. Anaambatana na rafikiye na kucheza mpira. Je,  atampelekea bibi alichotumwa?
children.title: Ah! Mpira!
children.author: Stella Kihweo

children.description: Nchi ni kavu mno na Siafu Mdogo anahisi kiu. Anapoenda mtoni kutafuta maji,  anapelekwa na mawimbi. Njiwa anaokoa maisha ya Siafu Mdogo. Ni vipi Siafu Mdogo anatoa shukurani zake kwa Njiwa?
children.title: Siafu amwokoa Njiwa
children.author: Kholeka Mabeta

children.description: Watoto wawili wana furaha wanapojitayarisha kumtembelea bibi kijijini. Wanafurahia maisha kijijini sana wanpourudi nyumbani,  wanatazamia matembezi yajayo.
children.title: Likizo kwa Bibi
children.author: Violet Otieno

children.description: Wasichana wawili wadogo wanakwenda safari ya kutafuta chakula. Wote wanamkuta mwanamke mkongwe njiani,  lakini ni mmoja tu anayekubali kumsaidia.
children.title: Nelima atajirika
children.author: Salaama Wanale

children.description: Kobe anaitafuta nyumba yake. Ataipata wapi?
children.title: Nyumba ya Kobe
children.author: Maya Fowler

children.description: Mtu na bibiye wanamzaa mtoto wa miujiza.
children.title: Mtoto wa miujiza
children.author: Jackline Akute

children.description: Sungura ni wanyama wanaosumuliwa sana kwenye hadithi za Kiafrika.
children.title: Kwa nini viboko hawana manyoya
children.author: David Ker

children.description: Msichana huyu mdogo anakua akiwa na mkeka wa ajabu. Mkeka wa Akai unamkinga kutokana na hatari na kwa usaidizi wa ndege mdogo,  anafaulu kupata njia na kurudi nyumbani baada ya kupotea milimani.
children.title: Mkeka wa Akai
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: Namorutunga ni mahali pa kale Kenya penye nguzo 19 za mawe. Hadithi hii inaeleza jinsi mawe hayo yalikuja kuwepo mahali hapo.
children.title: Namorutunga
children.author: Simon Ipoo

children.description: Kiundu ni mlafi na mchoyo. Yeye hupenda vya bwerere. Atawezaje kufaidika kwa kuhudhuria sherehe mbili kwa siku moja?
children.title: Kiundu mlafi
children.author: Mutugi Kamundi

children.description: Kisaa kuhusu familia ndogo ilioishi katikwa jangwa la Turkana,  kaskazini magharibi nchini Kenya.
children.title: Lodipo amtoroka mama
children.author: John Nga'sike

children.description: Bweha mwenye njaa anaiona bustani iliyo na zabibu mbivu zinazoning'inia kutoka kwenye tawi. Bweha anaruka juu kutaka kuzinyakua lakini badala yake,  anaangukia mgongo. Anaendelea kuruka juu zaidi na kila wakati anaanguka chini kwa kishindo. Je,  atawahi kuzipata zabibu?
children.title: Mbweha na zabibu chachu
children.author: Kholeka Mabeta

children.description: Hadithi hii inaelezea kwa nini nguruwe wana pua pana lililo sawasawa. Inatufunza nini tena?
children.title: Nguruwe Hawaruhusiwi
children.author: Basilio Gimo

children.description: Hadithi yenye kuchemsha bongo juu ya utafutaji wa mahali pako duniani.
children.title: Mtoto Punda
children.author: Lindiwe Matshikiza

children.description: Urafiki baina ya fisi na kunguru unakatika baada ya kunguru kumdanganya fisi. Soma uone vipi hili lilitokea.
children.title: Fisi na Kunguru
children.author: Ann Nduku

children.description: Wavulana wawili wanaopenda kuchunguza mazingira yao wanaishia kupitia yale ambayo hawakuwahi fikiria ingetendeka kwao. Soma uone ilivyokuwa!
children.title: Kutekwa nyara!
children.author: Collins Kipkirui

children.description: Nyanya anamshonea mjukuu wake mdogo sketi nzuri ya kupendeza. Marafiki zake wanaona wivu hivyo wanampangia njama kwa nia ya kujipatia ile sketi. Kisha msichana anamezwa na nyoka. Kwa bahati nzuri,  nyanyake anamwokoa.
children.title: Msichana aliyenuka
children.author: Southern African Folktale

children.description: Msichana mdogo anatazama na kudadizi namna bibi yake anavyotayarisha kuziweka ndizi ili ziive. Anakoziweka ndizi inabaki siri kubwa kwa huyu msichana anaudhika na jambo hilo. Je,  inachukuwa muda gani kabla msichana yule kuitambua siri ya bibi?
children.title: Ndizi za Bibi
children.author: Ursula Nafula

children.description: Palikuwa na wakati ambapo kulikuwa na jua saba angani. Kwa sababu ya joto jingi,  watu wanaamua kuziondoa jua zote. Wanaenda mbali zaidi na hatimaye,  ni jogoo ndiye anayeiokoa siku.
children.title: Sayari Jua ya Saba
children.author: Indian Folktale

children.description: Wasichana watatu wadogo wanakutana na jitu ambalo lajifanya kutaka msaada wao. Wakati jitu linamwongoza msichana mmoja mbali mtu mmoja anawasimamisha na kuuliza jina la msichana yule. Nini kitakachotokea kwa msichana huyo?
children.title: Mkoba Uzungumzao
children.author: Caroline Lentupuru

children.description: Mvulana aliyekuwa na sura mbaya anaenda msituni kutafuta mzizi wa kipekee ambao mwanamke mkongwe wa kiajabu anaahidi utamwezesha kuwa wa kupendeza. Kule msituni anakumbwa na majaribu mengi.
children.title: Mvulana aliyechukiwa na wote
children.author: Phumy Zikode

children.description: Hadithi ya mapenzi yenye huzuni kumhusu binti mrembo wa kifalme anayeamua kufuata moyo wake badala ya alivyotaka babake.
children.title: Binti wa Mflame Kayanja
children.author: Amana Yunus

children.description: Kulikuwa na mvulana mdogo asiyeweza kutenda jambo lolote vyema. Mamake alimvumilia,  lakini babake hakuweza kumstahimili. Siku moja babake aliamua kumfukuza kutoka nyumbani kwake. Mama alienda na mtoto wake. Nini kilitokea kwa Kisirusiru na mamake?
children.title: Kisirusiru, mjinga
children.author: Cissy Kiwanuka Luyiga

children.description: Anansi Buibui anapenda kula lakini hataki kazi ya kupika chakula. Anawaza juu itakayomwezesha wenzake wamjulishe chakula kinapokuwa tayari. Lakini kwa bahati mbaya,  mpango unaharibika na matokeo ni sababu ya buibui wana miguu mirefu myembamba.
children.title: Jinsi Anansi alipata miguu myembamba
children.author: Ghanaian folktale

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
children.title: ንፅረ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
children.title: ዓብያትለይ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
children.title: ሰመረ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
children.title: ድሙ ወፈረት
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
children.title: መርሃ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
children.title: ሓምሊ
children.author: USAID and Save The Children

children.description: እዚ ሓጋዛይ መፅሓፍ ንባብ፣ ካብ ዩ.ኤስ.ኤ.ኣይ.ዲ. (USAID) ካብ ዝተረኸበ ገንዘባዊ ሓገዝ ብፓክት ኢትዮጵያን (PACT Ethiopia) ብቢሮ ትምህርቲ ብሄራዊ ክልላዊ መንግስቲ ትግራይን ሓበራዊ ምትሕግጋዝ ተዳሊዉ፣ ብሴቭ ዘ ቺልድረንን (Save the Children) ብሚኒስቴር ትምህርትን ድማ ተመሓይሹ ተሓቲሙ።
